column4: I'm trying to setup ubuntu on my powerbook... It detects my wireless card, but when I go to connect to the network it fails... I supply the SSID and all forms of encryption/protection are turned off (completely open wifi)... but it fails to connect... Any suggestions?
they should have a speed test
maybe try boosting transmit power but its probably something simpler
are there any other open networks you can try?
channel right ssid case is correct?
